dct_title_s: A New Chart of the Gulf or Bay of Bengal
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by hachures. Depth shown by soundings. Panel title. "Published by Laurie & Whittle, 53, Fleet Street, 25th. August 1797." Includes text: "Observations of Captn. Hicks on the track of the ship Bahar from Madras to Bengal in the contrary monsoon."
dct_subject_sm: Nautical charts—Bengal, Bay of—Early works to 1800
dcat_theme_sm: Nautical charts—Bengal, Bay of—Early works to 1800
